summary: Former World War II flying ace Matt Brennan takes a position as a test pilot for a commercial aircraft corporation and bumps into his old girlfriend, Jo Holloway, who now works as a receptionist for the company.

keywords: washington monument washington d.c.|jet|test pilot|aerospace film|washington d.c.
title: Una llama en el espacio
